name: Rude Bear Requiem
description:
YOU CAN PICK THINGS UP ONLY IN NORMAL BEAR FORM. (You can become normal bear at any time by transforming into the same thing twice, like pressing 1 and 1 again).

The long awaited 12th game in the Rude Bear series, and the cutest!

Play in this cute, cute world. It's really cute and that's it, no super hard bosses for once. Join Rude Bear as he helps a fellow bear out collecting trinkets, and then help him return to where he came from afterwards.

CONTROLS:

PC:

PICK THINGS UP BY WALKING INTO THEM AS NORMAL RUDE BEAR. (Which you can do by transforming into the same form twice).

Transform with 123 or XCV and use updownleftright or WASD (sorry AZERTY people, wasd is fine, not sorry DVORAK people, change your layout).. or.. use a controller!

Space/Z are used to interact/do ability.

CONTROLLER:

A use/throw or do ability in transformed mode, BXY transform, stick move.
